function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of specific actions for health in the NUA","Impact":"Failure to address health-related risks and opportunities in urban development","Mitigation":"Developing specific actions and strategies to address health risks","Technologies":"Health-centric decision support tools, data collection and analysis tools","People":"Urban decision-makers, public, private, and civil society stakeholders","Owner":"Urban decision-makers, public, private, and civil society stakeholders"},{"Description":"Data gap at the local level","Impact":"Inability to assess health risks and opportunities at the local level","Mitigation":"Filling the local-level data gap, improving data collection and analysis","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools, technology for data sharing","People":"Urban decision-makers, data analysts, technology experts","Owner":"Urban decision-makers, data analysts, technology experts"},{"Description":"Lack of cooperation between stakeholders","Impact":"Inability to achieve systemic change and policy coherence in addressing health risks","Mitigation":"Increased cooperation between stakeholders, comprehensive discussions, cross-sectoral coordination","Technologies":"Collaboration platforms, communication and coordination tools","People":"Urban decision-makers, public, private, and civil society stakeholders","Owner":"Urban decision-makers, public, private, and civil society stakeholders"}]}
